title: 2 bed, 1 bath - Keyless entry - Washer and dryer included!!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 876 Sq.
Zócalo offers a luxury experience like no other, a one-of-a-kind apartment community rooted in celebration, culture, and the artisan spirit.

From our artist-in-residence program to touch points of heritage found throughout the multimillion dollar community renovation, Zócalo is a great place to live with unmatched on-site personal service.
We offer brand-new stylish kitchens and baths, a welcoming clubhouse, and gorgeous landscaping.
Residents benefit from close proximity to employment centers, downtown Houston, and the surrounding areas full of shopping, dining, and entertainment.
We have specially designed Zócalo with convenient app-based concierge services to complete your modern lifestyle.
Find your center — find your home — and discover what a true sense of community is all about at Zócalo.

Upscale Features, Brand-new Black Appliances, Vinyl Faux Wood Floors, Private Patios*, Two-tone Cabinets, Tech-savvy Features Like USB Outlets, Granite Countertops, Washer And Dryer*, Luxury Apartments, Brand New Kitchens, Brand New Baths, Built-in Microwave

Resident App & Portal, Pet Friendly, Package Lockers, On-site Gym, 24-hour Emergency Maintenance, Dedicated Yoga Studio, Artist-in-residence Program, Group Exercise Classes, Resort-like Ambiance, Party Room, Coffeehouse, Valet Trash Pickup, Sparkling Pool, Concierge Services, Laundry Center
